alert.note: Alert for Boyd; Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 9:03PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Holt and southeastern Boyd Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 903 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Atkinson, or 20 miles northwest of O`Neill, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... O`Neill, Atkinson, Stuart, Emmet, Monowi, Opportunity, Midway, Dorsey, Scottville and Redbird State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 280 and 308. Highway 281 between mile markers 183 and 206. Highway 12 between mile markers 143 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
